oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greetings from Alamo Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A color postcard with the messages: "Greetings from Alamo Tennessee," and "Greetings from the Moonshine State." The text is surrounded by cartoons of tobacco leaves, cotton, a man fishing, an outhouse building, a sign for Lookout Mountain, a dam, two men swimming, and a man holding a bottle of moonshine and a rifle. Features a divided back and handwritten correspondence on reverse. June 1, 1993 postmark.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cartoons (Commentary)
